name: Basketball 3D
description:
This basketball game is based on real physical rules.
Come and join the competition and win the championship!

How to play:
Just throw the ball into the basket!
Combo shots will earn you the flame ball and double score!

★ Challenge mode:
Achieve a required score within the specified time to enter the next level
★ Arcade mode:
Throw 5 balls to score at different pitches
★Time mode:
Try to shoot more balls in 45 seconds
★No-lost mode:
Shoot with 1 ball. If you miss the basket, you lose.
★ Free throw mode:
Stand on the free throw line and shoot 5 balls
★ 3-point line mode:
Pitch at different locations outside the 3-point line for 80 seconds

Get high scores as much as possible in a limited time!
Win three-pointers and improve your rankings to become the next generation of dunk legends!
